Articles.Content:
Hello everybody,

I'm an Italian teenager, I play Kerbal Space Program since it's early versions (when there was no moon), now i succeed to land even on Duna... without fuel to go back tho , not a fan of Nuclear Engines, don't like them at all, and i am using mods such Space World, NovaPunch, KW Rocketry, Deadly Reentry, also tried the Real Solar System, just achieved an orbit, i didn't found any mod that could get some real engines, i tried to do it for myself, but was too lazy for make the fuel match

I am also trying to calculate everything before a flight (Am I the only?).

I like motorsport (such Formula One, MotoGP, etc), 3D Modeling, Simulators (Assetto Corsa, ArmA 3, ofc KSP) and well... i guess it's enough to introduce myself...

Hello!

I'm relatively younger: only been playing since .19 (I think May? Wow, it's been longer than I thought!).

It's great that KSP allows you to play however you want. I've changed my playstyle with every save. Sometimes I've gone heavy with mod parts, other times I've focused on mission planning with life support and RemoteTech, and recently, I went stock with just helper plugins. Lots of great ways to play. I haven't done the FAR/Deadly Reentry/Real Solar System combo yet... Maybe next game.

Benvenuto!

Your dislike of nuclear engines is understandable, but... leave them for the final stage for interplanetary transfer, carry like 3-4 of them, you'll be amazed at their fuel efficiency. Thing is, they only operate well once you are out of the atmosphere.

Imho, using mods should be on a "need to" basis. As in: you do stock until you realize something important is missing from your game. THEN you add a mod that does exactly what you lack in stock game. After that, if you feel some other aspect is missing, then you install another one.

I don't really calculate stuff before the launch. I DO however put on a MechJeb and watch the TWR while I am building stages in the VAB. That helps a lot, prevents me from building underpowered stuff.

I hate motorsports (I value my limbs more than the adrenaline high), but I do like simulators (I value my adrenaline high more than the time I spend in front of the screen hehe). I also dab in 3D modeling every now and then (mostly when work calls for that - I do graphics, and sometimes it needs a bit of 3D in it). Ah well, guess that's enough for a warm welcome ; )

---------------------------------------

Come fly with us!

Thanks for the warm welcome guys, using mods, is a need to... but the loading time it's so damn long with 15 mods, about 2 or 4 minutes, and about calculations, I just check the DeltaV of my spaceship, which engine is needed for lift the stages, and the orbital velocity for a perfect orbit

About the combo FARM/Deadly Reentry/Real Solar System, i don't know if Deadly Reentry really works, reentering at 7,4km/s, neither the shields works lol, they just get vaporized.

See you in space, if multiplayer comes out !
